extensions.name: Sentinel Orchestrator v3
extensions.description: Upgrades the sentinel lattice to support hour-scale autonomy, multi-agent telemetry stitching, and guardian hot-swap controls.
rolloutPlan: Announce freeze window to validator guild
Stage upgrade bundle on Safe with guardian signatures
Run 2h soak test with synthetic anomalies
Publish telemetry digest to guardian console

rollback.description: Re-stage the previous SentinelOrchestrator implementation with identical pause cadence and guardian signatures.

valueLevers: Reduces false-positive pauses by 42% under simulation load
Unlocks 8h autonomy approvals for resilience >0.9 domains

extensions.name: Capital Stream Router v2
extensions.description: Introduces milestone-aware streaming with guardian-triggered throttle controls for high-risk domains.
rolloutPlan: Snapshot vault balances and outstanding milestones
Stage router extension with guardian pause
Replay last 30 days of cashflows in simulation
Activate extension once validator guild signs audit
Broadcast new throttle policy to mission control

rollback.description: Fallback to router v1 using recorded vault snapshots and guardian pause window.

valueLevers: Enables milestone-based drip releases for multi-agent swarms
Improves capital efficiency by 18% across funded domains
